p: The results of the effect of the essential oil on hatching inhibition, as means of the two experiments, are presented in Figure 3. The effect of the essential oil on hatching of J2s was related to different doses after 35 days exposure for both species. The hatching of M. incognita J2s was decreasing as the dose was increasing. The lowest numbers of hatched J2s were recorded at the doses of 2000 and 4000 μL/L. A clear reduction in M. javanica juveniles hatching was observed, as the dose was increased to 250 μL/L, a fact constantly observed as the dose was increasing up to 4000 μL/L.
